archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Transfer Posting Interface; DB Schenker SAP --> Vestas SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
When Schenker moves materials from one storage location to another then a material document using ​movement type 311 (Transfer posting storage location - one-step) is created. This movement type is used​ when Schenker moves materials between the different storage locations inside the central warehouse in ​Mutzschen:​ Main  (1000)​ TRD  (1001)​ Calibration  (1002)​ Repair  (1003)​
The created material document is interfaced to Vestas using the IDoc MBGMCR02
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
